Ugochi Constance Alam (amụrụ na Mee 4 1988) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic si na Naijiria, na-asọmpi karịsịa na ụdị F57/58 shot put na discus throw events.
Alam sonyere na egwuregwu ndị Commonwealth mere n'afọ 2022 wee bụrụ onye nke atọ, wetakwa ọla nchara na ihe egwuregwu shot put ụmụ nwanyị F57/F58.
